entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 14. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
